title: Child, Three Adults Injured in DeKalb Shooting
content:
Four people -- including a child -- were injured in a shooting at a DeKalb apartment complex located near Decatur on Monday night.
According to the AJC, the shooting happened at the Austin Oaks apartments on Glenwood Avenue.
The child was taken to Children’s Healthcare of Atlanta in critical condition, according to a DeKalb fire department spokesman.
The adults were taken to a local hospital, with non life-threatening injuries.
No motive has been determined in the shooting.
